column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: godfather. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: @prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix ex: <http://example.com/> .ex:godfather rdf:type rdfs:Class .ex:Person rdf:type rdfs:Class .ex:hasGodfather rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain ex:Person ;    rdfs:range ex:godfather .    ex:male rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf ex:Person .    ex:female rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf ex:Person .    ex:marriedTo rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain ex:Person ;    rdfs:range ex:Person .    ex:parentOf rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain ex:Person ;    rdfs:range ex:Person .    ex:child rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf ex:Person .    ex:assignedBy rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain ex:godfather ;    rdfs:range ex:Person .    ex:religion rdf:type rdfs:Class .    ex:followsReligion rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain ex:Person ;    rdfs:range ex:religion .    ex:baptism rdf:type rdfs:Class .    ex:partOfBaptism rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:subClassOf ex:godfather ;    rdfs:range ex:baptism .
